Reviews.Title: “So-So hotel”

Reviews.Content: staff clean cleaning service everyday absolutely tiny move literally entire half door bathroom blocked due bedside table doors paper kept nights due talking tv reception hotel location main drag extremely close main attractions dont mind shuffling furniture move unfortunately

Reviews.Title: “Great Find”

Reviews.Content: turkish friend helped hotel traveling 3 children hotel close tourist spots main street quiet breakfast plentiful staff extremely helpful nice clean cleaned daily ive lived istanbul traveled pleasant stay ive definitely recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good location... at that's all”
Reviews.Author: Zara Y
Reviews.Content: hotel indeed location close tourist destinations positive incredibly cells bathrooms size toilets aircrafts met country double prepared couple 3rd floor tiny tired scuffed walls awful view window morning changed 2nd floor picture view street noisy hear happening reception stairs pictures booking sites reflect real condition id recommend hotel transit travellers trips
